lead_paragraph: President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad insisted in a speech that Iran would not give “one iota” in the discussions.
snippet: President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad insisted in a speech that Iran would not give “one iota” in the discussions.

headline.main: Date Set for Nuclear Talks With Iran
headline.seo: Date Set for Nuclear Talks Between Europe and Iran
headline.print_headline: WORLD BRIEFING | MIDDLE EAST; Iran: Date Set for Nuclear Talks With European Union

byline.original: By WILLIAM YONG and J. DAVID GOODMAN
byline.contributor: William Yong reported from Tehran, and J. David Goodman from New York. Stephen Castle contributed reporting from Brussels.
